thread.title: Brothers retire after 37 years of food and friends at Atlas Coney Island
thread.title_full: Brothers retire after 37 years of food and friends at Atlas Coney Island

author: Molly Young | myoung7@mlive.com
title: Brothers retire after 37 years of food and friends at Atlas Coney Island

locations.name: atlas coney island atlas coney island

text: Atlas Coney Island was a place you could usually find more than homemade food and original Flint-style coneys. It was where you could find friendship and were treated like family. It's where Jimmy and David Todorovsky chose to plant their family's roots.
